name: NSLayoutManager.ControlCharacterAction
desc: Constants that describe actions for control characters.

items.name: static var containerBreak: NSLayoutManager.ControlCharacterAction
items.desc: An action that triggers a break in layout for the current container.

items.name: static var horizontalTab: NSLayoutManager.ControlCharacterAction
items.desc: An action that inserts a horizontal tab.

items.name: static var lineBreak: NSLayoutManager.ControlCharacterAction
items.desc: An action that causes a line break.

items.name: static var paragraphBreak: NSLayoutManager.ControlCharacterAction
items.desc: An action that causes a paragraph break.

items.name: static var zeroAdvancement: NSLayoutManager.ControlCharacterAction
items.desc: An action that removes the glyph from layout.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new control character action with the specified raw value.
